Title: Relates to the electrification of the Manhattan Cruise Terminal
Summary: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to develop a study of competitive options to facilitate the electrification of the Manhattan Cruise Terminal and to establish programs and other initiatives necessary to carry out the strategies, programs, standards, and requirements described in the study; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to the electrification of the Manhattan Cruise Terminal; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
